task_description: You are an expert in ontology construction from a set of domain (general topic), slot (information type about entities in a domain) or value (concrete instances of information in slots) candidate terms in task-oriented dialogue.
term_list: Here is the list of terms:
output_instruction: Predict relations in the dialogue between those given terms that are values or domains. Predict the 'belongs to domain' relation between values and domains in the form [valuename, belongs to domain, domainname]. Make sure to put brackets around each relational triplet!
